r.d: Spreadsheet_Excel_Writer was born as a porting of the Spreadsheet::WriteExcel Perl module to PHP. It allows writing of Excel spreadsheets without the need for COM objects. It supports formulas, images (BMP) and all kinds of formatting for text and cells. It currently supports the BIFF5 format (Excel 5.0), so functionality appeared in the latest Excel versions is not yet available.
r.n: QA release Bug #18590 Impossible to work from IIS7 Bug #18024 deprecated line 180, 186 with php 5.3.2 Bug #16025 MERGEDCELLS record split by CONTINUE record Bug #17766 Patch: Avoid deprecated split Bug #17572 Temporary files are not removed Bug #16938 open_basedir check is wrong in Spreadsheet_Excel_Writer_Worksheet::_initialize Bug #14585 open_basedir workaround doesn't work Bug #12362 named worksheets & utf-8 Bug #14515 writeUrl only uses writeString, never writeNumber Bug #14281 Using a row > 16,384 reports error Request #13486 Set the worksheet direction to right-to-left (RTL) Bug #12720 Notice thrown when using setColumn (undefined colFirst and colLast) Bug #12053 With SetVersion(8) setting bottom border color to 0 gives cross borders (!)
